fields.label: Purpose
fields.description: Establishes a framework to prevent, report, and address harassment in the workplace.

fields.label: Scope
fields.description: Applies to all employees, contractors, suppliers, and partners; includes digital and in-person interactions.

fields.label: Types of Prohibited Harassment
options: Any behavior undermining dignity and well-being

fields.label: Reporting and Grievance Mechanism
options: Report to supervisor, manager, or representative

fields.label: Consequences of Non-Compliance
fields.description: Violators face disciplinary action; failure to report may lead to corrective measures for management.

fields.label: Policy Review
fields.description: Regularly reviewed for alignment with labor laws and WIETA/SIZA standards.
